code: import axios from'axios';var baseUrl="http://localhost:4000/api/article";export default{getArticles:function getArticles(headers){return axios.get(baseUrl+"/",{headers:headers});},postArticles:function postArticles(data,headers){return axios.post(baseUrl+"/",data,{headers:headers});},getOneArticle:function getOneArticle(id,headers){return axios.get(baseUrl+"/"+id,{headers:headers});},putArticle:function putArticle(id,data,headers){return axios.put(baseUrl+"/"+id,data,{headers:headers});},deleteArticle:function deleteArticle(id,headers){return axios.delete(baseUrl+"/"+id,{headers:headers});},likeArticle:function likeArticle(id,headers){return axios.post("http://localhost:4000/api/like/article/"+id,{},{headers:headers});}};
